template.name: RingNodeSync
RingNodeAsync
PlanGeneration
PlanGenerationHole

transition.label: chosenPos[setup] = -1, setup++, nextNodePosition += distanceBetweenNodes, nextTargetPosition += distanceBetweenTargets

query.formula: A[] forall (i: UID) RingNodeSync(i).TermWait imply start == RingNodeSync(i).ID
A[] forall (i: UID) RingNodeAsync(i).TermWait imply start == RingNodeAsync(i).ID
